attributes.action: Stop uninsured vehicles on the road by Including Third Party Insurance in Vehicle Excise Duty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If 3rd party insurance was included in the VED(road tax), and ved discs were incorporated into front and rear number plates, we as motorists, and the police would not need the use of ridiculously expensive equipment to find a non insured or taxed vehicle, reducing the number of non-insured collisions and tax evaders!
